content.description: Start at the same hold for Lover of the Light and traverse right a couple moves to get to a jug.  Move left hand up to good edge and then lock off and go up right to an intermediate crimp and then again to a good hold just under lip.  From here reach up to lip and top out slightly right.
content.protection: more pads the better and spotters are good.  Landing is very rocky and slanted away from you

content.description: Start on a slanting triangular edge with big feet at the base of the overhang and move up and left using a good right hand crimp undercling and thin left hand crimps to eventually bump left hand out to a good hold at the lip.  Match and top out straight up
content.protection: two pads minimum and spotters are ideal.  the landing is very rocky
content.location: Start on triangular slanting edge.  That's what i did at least but there is a nice traverse at the base so you could traverse into the start too for a little extra pump.

content.description: Pretty secluded area and right in the sun during the day.  The rock looks sick and has some potential for hard routes i think given the overhang but it is pretty flaky so definitely pull on holds to test them before actually climbing to make sure there is no flex.  The top out could use more of a cleaning but topping our right or left of apex right now isn't bad.
